title: Chat bubbles not sorted properly
body:
The chat bubbles in the chat were not sorted chronologically, like they should be in a real chat.
Instead, my friend's messages were all stacked up above mine.

replies.body:
Make sure you report it through the app as well! 

I will make a note of this, thanks for the report.

This screenshot was taken before that one, don't know why it wasn't posted along with it.

http://imgur.com/yDaXpEe
